patthana21.12:1.1: Nasaññojanaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā saññojano akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.12:3.1: Naganthaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā gantho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.12:5.1: Naoghaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā ogho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.12:7.1: Nayogaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā yogo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.12:9.1: Nanīvaraṇaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nīvaraṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.12:11.1: Naparāmāsaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā parāmāso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
